biography:
Corey Glover (born November 6, 1964, Brooklyn, New York) is an American musician, singer, and guitarist. He is best known as the lead singer of the hard rock band Living Colour.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Corey Glover, licensed under CC-BY-SA,full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
